channel.description: Recent content in Python on loikein's notes

item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Shell Pipeline Git Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging Example Process of Setting Up A Project Python Setup iPython Kernel License Slides Effective programming practices for economists: Slides — Hans-Martin von Gaudecker Templates for Reproducible Research Projects in Economics — Tutorial: Templates for reproducible research projects Dropbox - prog-econ-log Shell $ who # Loikein console Oct 13 18:28 # Loikein ttys000 Oct 15 08:49 $ whoami # Loikein $ who am i # Loikein ttys000 Oct 15 08:49 $ alias # show all alias commands $ ls # list $ ls -lh # list in long format and file size $ ls -lha # list all files in long format and file size $ pwd # print working directory $ cd # change directory $ mkdir # make directory (new folder) $ mv # move (change name of directory) $ rm -r # remove directory $ man # manual $ [command] -h # help $ subl something.

item.title: Introduction to Python 3
item.description: Slides Basics Lab Slides ch1 ch2 ch3 ch4 Basics print("Hello world") 1 + 2 # Out[1]: 3 print( 1 + 2 ) # 3 print( 2 - 1 ) # 1 print( 2 * 3 ) # 6 print( 4 / 2 ) # 2.0 print( 7 % 3 ) # 1 print( 4 ** 2 ) # 16 'ab' + 'cd' # 'abcd' height = 1.
